overview:
Lee is an accomplished integrated marketing executive and entrepreneur with proven success developing strategy, simplifying complex technologies, launching new products and leading cross-functional teams in the dynamic, rapidly changing tech space. He was most recently a Cofounder and the Vice President of Business Development and Operations at next generation film marketing start up Prescreen. Before Prescreen, he was a senior executive at technology marketing agencies, growing and managing technology brands.

Lee began his career in the music industry developing cross-platform marketing strategies for emerging artists on EMI Records (Virgin Records and Capitol Records) and Universal Music Group (Lost Highway Records). Lee holds a BS degree in Business Communications from Vanderbilt University.

relationships.title: Co-Founder, VP of Business Development & Operations
